hero.title: Welcome to My Portfolio
hero.description: I'm a passionate developer specializing in creating beautiful and functional applications. Explore my projects and let's build something amazing together.

g10burguer.description: Academic project developing a fast-food delivery app with comprehensive features including login, profile, menu, cart, and delivery tracking.
g10burguer.longDescription: Academic project developing a fast-food delivery app with comprehensive features including login, profile, menu, cart, and delivery tracking. In this project, I was responsible for all the visual aspects and assisted with Kotlin code development.

bikengo.description: Academic project for a bicycle rental app featuring login, menu, rental management, and receipt generation.
bikengo.longDescription: Academic project for a bicycle rental app featuring login, menu, rental management, and receipt generation. In this project, I was responsible for all the visual design aspects.

simplepills.description: A personal project aimed at helping users track their medication schedule through a gamified experience.
simplepills.longDescription: A personal project aimed at helping users track their medication schedule through a gamified experience. The goal is to provide users with a scoring system for taking medications on time while maintaining usage records, combining fun and education.

talkables.description: A conversation starter app that generates topics for group discussions. Perfect for breaking the ice with new friends!
talkables.longDescription: A personal project app developed to generate conversations in groups of 2 or more people. The app features a single button that, when clicked, generates a phrase with a theme that will serve as a topic for everyone in the group to interact with. The goal is to be used as an 'ice breaker' in conversations with new friends!

toxicgas.description: Academic project developing an Arduino-based toxic gas sensor system with simulation and documentation.
toxicgas.longDescription: Academic project on Embedded Systems. Development of an Embedded System based on an Arduino UNO, through simulation and documentation of all components used, as well as device operation documentation.

portfolio.description: Personal portfolio website showcasing projects and skills.
portfolio.longDescription: Modern portfolio website built with React and TypeScript, featuring a responsive design, project showcase, and contact form.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Passionate developer specializing in web development with a focus on intuitive and performant user experiences. I love creating innovative and functional solutions that make a difference.
